entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
